title: Authorised car dealers can claim input tax credit on demo cars: AAR
description: GST Authority ruled dealers can claim input tax credit on demo cars. Landmark Cars East Pvt Ltd sought ruling on taxation aspects, specified time period for inward supply to potential Mercedes Benz car buyers.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
